examples.target_state: Template 1: "[Product] is a/an [category] that [main benefit]. Features include [feature 1], [feature 2], and [feature 3]. Trusted by..."

templates.template: [Product] is a/an [category] that [main benefit]. Features include [feature 1], [feature 2], and [feature 3]. Trusted by [social proof].
